contents.text: Thank you for calling Stratim, the San Francisco–based leader in intelligent fleet operations technology.
For technical support with your fleet management platform, press 1.
For software troubleshooting and bug reporting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a software support specialist.

navigationGoals: I need help resolving a persistent dashboard error in the fleet management software.
My fleet management dashboard is freezing when I assign routes and I need software support.
Report a 500 error in the API when syncing telemetry data and get help debugging it.
My fleet management app keeps crashing when I try to view vehicle details; I need help troubleshooting the software.
Troubleshoot a data visualization glitch in the fleet management software.

contents.text: For hardware integrations and API assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our integrations team.

navigationGoals: I want assistance configuring the API to integrate our onboard hardware with your platform.
I need assistance integrating my vehicle telematics devices with your API.
Integrate CAN bus sensors with the telematics gateway hardware and configure the API data stream.
I’m trying to connect my new GPS tracker to Stratim’s platform but don’t know how to set up the API; please assist.
Configure the API for integrating custom GPS hardware with the platform.

contents.text: For sales, pricing, and new customer inquiries, press 2.
To request a demo or discuss pricing plans, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: I'd like to schedule a product demo and get detailed pricing options for my team.
I'd like to schedule a demo and get pricing details for your platform.
Schedule a demo of the fleet analytics module and get pricing for a 50-vehicle subscription plan.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your fleet management system and learn about subscription pricing.
Schedule a live demo and discuss subscription pricing for academic use.

contents.text: For partnership opportunities and enterprise solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our partnerships department.

navigationGoals: I'm interested in exploring an enterprise partnership and large-scale deployment solutions.
I want to discuss an enterprise partnership to deploy your system across our veteran-run logistics network.
Explore an OEM partnership to integrate Stratim’s enterprise telematics platform into our fleet management solution.
I’m interested in enterprise partnership options to customize your fleet solution for my delivery business.
Inquire about a research partnership to integrate my optimization algorithms into the platform.
